Workflow.Name: Kudos - Share Kudo with Sender, Assign to Recipient
Workflow.Description: When a Kudos record is created, this flow sets the appropriate Kudos owner and sharing privileges for the sender, the recipient and the recipient's manager.

LocalizedName.description: Kudos - Share Kudo with Sender, Assign to Recipient

Description.description: When a Kudos record is created, this flow sets the appropriate Kudos owner and sharing privileges for the sender, the recipient and the recipient's manager.
